The distance light travels in one year is approximately $ 5,870,000,000,000$ miles. The distance light travels in $ 100$ years is:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 587 * 10^8 \text{ miles} \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ 587 * 10^{10} \text{ miles} \qquad\textbf{(C)}\ 587*10^{ - 10} \text{ miles}$\\
$ \textbf{(D)}\ 587 * 10^{12} \text{ miles} \qquad\textbf{(E)}\ 587* 10^{ - 12} \text{ miles}$
